Code: EXEC SQL SELECT T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, T1.OCORHIST, T1.OPERACAO, T1.DTMOVTO, T1.VAL_OPERACAO, T1.SITUACAO, T2.DES_OPERACAO, T2.DES_ABREVIADA FROM seguros.v0histsini T1, seguros.v0histsini T2 WHERE T1.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO = :NUM_APOL_SINISTRO AND T2.COD_OPERACAO = T1.OPERACAO AND T2.IDE_SISTEMA = 'SI' ORDER BY T1.OCORHIST, T1.DTMOVTO, T1.OPERACAO DESC END SQL
